item.title: Shuo Zhan's HomePage
item.description: About me This is a simple page for academic website based on Hexo. It just provides a theme frame and all depends on your markdown postsâ€™ styles. This is the index page which organized with the posts you write in markdown files. News 2020-04-23: ver 1.2.0 publish, support pjax. 2020 February, Join in Test University. A new theme for academic page is published. Publications [1] Einstein, Albert, Boris Podolsky, and Nathan Rosen.
